title: I'm pretty sure I'm being trolled.
body:
Went from gold 1 to plat 2 easy as pie in the last week, with this massive winstreak I could smell the lose streak edging nearer to reality. 
Unfortunately the day finally came. The lose streak.
Yes my performance in every game has not always been perfect. That being said I have had not one person carry me, in the last couple of days. Its either I carry or I lose. In fact my last solo queue games have been throws that were all on my team mates. 

My hope for reaching Diamond 5 is dwindling, I need help. Send help. 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
